functionDecorators.name: debtChanged
functionDecorators.description: Notifies the correct supplyMiner of a change in debt. Only the vaultsCore can call this. `debtChanged` will silently return if collateralType is not known to prevent any problems in vaultscore.

parameterDecorators.name: _vaultId
parameterDecorators.description: the ID of the vault of which the debt has changed.*.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateralSupplyMiner
functionDecorators.description: Updates the collateral to supplyMiner mapping. Manager role in the AccessController is required to call this.

parameterDecorators.name: supplyMiner
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the supplyMiner which will be notified on debt changes for this collateralType.*.
